title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate development velocity with better code reviews (DVT344)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过更好的代码审查加速开发速度 (DVT344)
abstract: Code review bottlenecks cost engineering organizations velocity, predictability, and developer satisfaction. Large pull requests create multi-day review cycles, context switching destroys focus, and merge conflicts compound as teams scale. The root cause? Misalignment between how developers work (inner loop) and how code gets reviewed and deployed (outer loop). In this session, explore how optimizing both loops transforms team throughput. Learn organizational patterns for breaking changes into reviewable units that enable parallel reviews and accelerate shipping. Walk away with a framework for implementing workflow changes that measurably reduce cycle time across your organization. This presentation is brought to you by Graphite, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 代码审查瓶颈会影响工程组织的开发速度、可预测性和开发者满意度。大型拉取请求会产生多日的审查周期，上下文切换会破坏专注力，随着团队规模扩大，合并冲突会不断累积。根本原因是什么？开发者工作方式（内循环）与代码审查和部署方式（外循环）之间的不匹配。在本次会议中，探讨如何通过优化这两个循环来提升团队吞吐量。学习将变更拆分为可审查单元的组织模式，实现并行审查并加速交付。带走一个实施工作流变更的框架，可在整个组织中显著减少周期时间。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Graphite提供。
